Package index

All functions

aggregation()
Aggregation of the disaggregated units to uniform reaches using statistical methods
centerline()
creates a centerline from the raster based corridor mask
channelExtraction()
Extracting a channel network from a digital elevation network using SAGA GIS
computeIndices()
Compute Morphometric Indices
computeMembership()
Compute Membership based on Linear Functions
densify_sf()
Helper function to densify points on the boundary of a polygon
disaggregate()
Disaggregate the river corridor
extend_line()
This is a helper function for constructing the centerline. Its intended for internal use only
extract_channels_grass()
Extracting a channel network from a digital elevation network using GRASS GIS
fuzzy_overlay()
Overlay several fuzzified indices
install_grass()
Helper function to install GRASS GIS on the machine
install_saga()
Helper function to install SAGA GIS on the machine
make_profile()
Creates a longitudinal profile using a DEM (or other raster) and a channel line as input
pettitt_test()
Test for changepoints in an univariate series using an iterative pettitt test
profile_distance()
Computing distance along a channel
riverMapper
riverMapper
